actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to recommendations made by the Administration to remove the tax exempt status of credit unions and to reject any such effort.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to recommendations made by the administration to reject any recommendation to remove the tax-exempt status of credit unions.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to recommendations made by the Administration to remove the tax exempt status of credit unions and to reject any such effort.
